name: No Escape (itch) (MsGenny, Nennu)
description:
You want to die.

Everyday life is dull and grey.

You yearn for the sweet, sweet release of..

GAME OVER

However, the only thing that greets you is...

A spongey denial of afterlife!

----

Use A&D to seek your destruction

Jump in the pits and on the sponges with SPACE


Use the cursed existence of sponges to leap higher, and reach new areas and opportunities to move forward!
